text: Lily-Rose Melody Depp (born May 27, 1999) is a French-born American actress and model. She is the daughter of Johnny Depp and Vanessa Paradis. She is known for her role as Ellen Hutter in the 2024 supernatural horror movie Nosferatu. Depp began her acting career with a small role in Tusk (2014). She later starred in The Dancer (2016), Planetarium (2016), and The King (2019). ==References== Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Actors from Paris Category:American LGBT people Category:American child actors Category:Actors from Los Angeles Category:French LGBT people Category:Singers from Paris Category:Actors from New York City Category:Actors from Hauts-de-Seine Category:Singers from New York City Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Models from Los Angeles Category:Models from New York City Category:Models from Paris Category:People from Neuilly-sur-Seine
title: Lily-Rose Depp
